title: Tiny plastic, big problem - Science News Explores
body: Plastic bottles lying in the gutter. Grocery bags tangled in branches. Food wrappers scuttling across the ground on a windy day. Although such examples of litter easily come to mind, they only hint at the serious and growing problem of plastic pollution — a problem mostly hidden from view. The problem with plastics is they do not easily degrade.
readable_content: - Guest (2023-12-08): Can you provide information starting from "Plastic bottles lying in the gutter"? I'd like to know more about the issue of plastic pollution in the oceans.
summary: The post is inquiring about the issue of plastic pollution in the oceans, starting from plastic bottles lying in the gutter. The user appears to be genuinely interested in learning more about the topic. Sentiment: 0.8
